column4: Hello, would it be possible to run Ubuntu/PPC on a 1400c? I know they are NuBus based, just wondering :)
does linux support nubus at all?
yeah, i've heard someone running it on nubus'es
No idea, i just have a program that needs it.
doesn't appear to be in ubunt
are you sure? :/ because i installed initng and it works fine but apt-get says a lot of stuff about wrong libc6 version installed :(
the package may happen to work, mostly, but it really Depends on stuff for a reason
Well... The problem is, that it's a package for Debian. I've used it for many days and it works complely fine. The Ubuntu libc is compitable...
if you want that package on ubuntu, rebuild it from source
so, if you want it to work, you'll need to rebuild it from source
